thread.title: Mortenson seeks mediation over Vikings stadium change orders
thread.title_full: Mortenson seeks mediation over Vikings stadium change orders

author: Karlee Weinmann
title: Mortenson seeks mediation over Vikings stadium change orders
text:
Home / News / Construction & Development / Mortenson seeks mediation over Vikings stadium change orders M.A. Mortenson Co. and the Minnesota Sports Facilities Authority are at odds over $15 million in change orders linked to the Minnesota Vikings stadium project, under construction in downtown Minneapolis. (File photo: Bill Klotz) Mortenson seeks mediation over Vikings stadium change orders By: Karlee Weinmann August 7, 2015 9:01 am 0 Both parties contend they are not responsible for change orders that pumped up the U.S. Bank Stadiumâ€™s price tag past $1.08 billion.
